name: Happy Birthday (itch) (Martin Nerurkar)
description:
Designed and developed by Martin Nerurkar of Sharkbomb Studios.
Happy Birthday is a short narrative experiment created for the Ludum Dare 29 competition.

The theme was Beneath the Surface and the game presents a superficial conversation that can potentially go deeper.

Read more about the game's development and themes in this blog article.
If you don't want to play, here's a brief youtube video of the game, scratching the surface.
